title: Char Kuey Teow
description: A smoky, stir fried rice noodle dish that combines savory, sweet, and umami flavors.

title: Asam Laksa
description: A noodle dish that comes with a sour fish and tamarind-based broth, gives the soup a well-balanced sour, sweet and spicy taste.

title: Cendol
description: An iced sweet dessert that contains pandan-flavoured green rice flour jelly, coconut milk and palm sugar syrup.
